azure_blob_storage_endpoint.title: Endpoint Domain Name
azure_blob_storage_endpoint.description: This is Azure Blob Storage endpoint domain name. Leave default value (or leave it empty if run container from command line) to use Microsoft native from example.

azure_blob_storage_container_name.title: Azure blob storage container (Bucket) Name
azure_blob_storage_container_name.description: The name of the Azure blob storage container.

azure_blob_storage_account_name.title: Azure Blob Storage account name
azure_blob_storage_account_name.description: The account's name of the Azure Blob Storage.

azure_blob_storage_account_key.title: Azure Blob Storage account key
azure_blob_storage_account_key.description: The Azure blob storage account key.

azure_blob_storage_blobs_tags.title: Azure Blob Storage blobs tags
azure_blob_storage_blobs_tags.description: The Azure blob storage tag query to be applied

azure_blob_storage_blobs_prefix.title: Azure Blob Storage blobs prefix
azure_blob_storage_blobs_prefix.description: The Azure blob storage prefix to be applied

azure_blob_storage_blobs_schema.title: Azure Blob Storage blobs schema
azure_blob_storage_blobs_schema.description: The Azure blob storage schema to be used
